node.text:
If holistic wellness is on your mind, then the panoramic view of the unending Arabian Sea is sure to set the mood for rejuvenation at the Favourite Ayurveda & Wellness Spa. Choose from Panchakarma or other traditional Kerala Ayurveda treatments like Pizhichil (Medical Oil Bath), Njavarakizhi, Dhara, Marma Therapy, Therapeutic Yoga & Meditation or even the Wellness Package, Lifestyle Package or Specialized Therapeutic Care treatments.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
